data.title: Lagrange, Indiana Population 2024
data.text:
Lagrange is a city located in LaGrange County and Steuben County Indiana. Lagrange has a 2024 population of 2,742. Lagrange is currently growing at a rate of 0.26% annually and its population has increased by 1.03% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 2,714 in 2020.

The average household income in Lagrange is $65,178 with a poverty rate of 13.52% . The median age in Lagrange is 40.6 years: 35.9 years for males, and 41.7 years for females.

Lagrange Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Lagrange was:

White : 82.07%

Two or more races : 12.94%

Other race : 4.24%

Black or African American : 0.61%

Native American : 0.14%

Asian : 0%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0%
